p: Estimates based on country information indicate that the regional population of MSM and TG who are at risk of HIV infection ranges from 10.5-27 million 1. TG women are 50 times more likely to acquire HIV than adult males or females of reproductive age. For example, 18 per cent of surveyed male sex workers in Indonesia and Thailand tested HIV-positive, 31 per cent of TG sex workers in Jakarta, and 19 per cent in Maharashtra 1.
